Author: AmoreJaz
Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform
Body: hold your horses! i havent seen any charity-related platform attain their success in crypto. because in reality, either the project is a scam or a crap one. they are using the face of charity for their personal gain. now, you have to prove the community your authenticity and it would take time to do that. but anyway, you have all the time in the world to show what youve got.

Author: LifeCharity
Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform
Body: Thank you for your attention. At the beginning of developement of Life Charity we have analyzed the whole market of charity platforms or charity-related projects that have blockchain technology in their system. And you are absolutely right - most of them using blockchain only because it was a tranding technology and it helped to collect money or it just has been used it in wrong direction. We figured out how to use it right and make donations much easier and more transparent. Our team is not looking forward to collect money from this ICO for pernosal gains since we are not starting this ICO at the period of time when 90% of the ICOs were successfull only because of the market saturation and we will appreciate any help that we will get just to create reputation of technology that helps people for blockchain.

Author: LifeCharity
Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform
Body: Thank you. Our mass media director will verify our team members and update some information about ICO.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform

Author: Cholidm
Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform
Body: Hopefully this project will truly achieve its goals. I see this project is very good with a very noble goal of a place to channel charity donations. I hope that the existence of a platform project like this will make the distribution of charity donations easier and faster and truly channeled

Author: LifeCharity
Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform
Body: Thank you sir. We are working very hard to make world a better place and make blockchain part of it.

Author: dzkrb
Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform
Body: You wrote. "Our platform wants to be the first and highest quality product developed on the market. cryptocurrency market. With the help of the Charity Platform LIFE, consumers want to be able to select any available non-profit foundation and donate any amount of Ethereum tokens to it. As a reward, each participant wants to receive "LFT" - tokens that can be sold on any available stock exchange or stored on the ERC-20 wallet. "But to become an advanced and high-quality platform, you need to change the engine. ERC-20 is outdated, everyone is switching to ERC-223.

Author: LifeCharity
Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform
Body: Our team has been looking forward to change our token format, but at this moment, since we are only at the ICO stage, there is no need in ERC-223 format. After release of our platform format of tokens will be changed. Thank you for your attention

Author: toyo87
Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform
Body: Helloo Dev, since your project is based on charity. What will be the benefit of the community and investors?

Author: LifeCharity
Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform
Body: Hello toyo and thank you for your attention. Community will receive one of the first social-based projects in cryptocurrency area, it will create a good reputation for blockchain projects in general. As you know, most of the people outside of blockchain and cryptocurrency world consider this whole area as a tool for buying illegal stuff, scam and other things that pushing potential investors away, with more projects like ours cryptocurrencies will become more attractive and safe in general. Investors will receive share in a company`s governance structure (biggest investors can manage a crowdfunding events on our platform) and most important - will become part of the project that in future will be partnered with big organizations like WWF, Unicef, Greenpeace and others - that will be a good sign of financial grow.

Author: LifeCharity
Title: [ANN] [ICO] LIFE CHARITY - Global blockchain charity platform
Body: Thank you for listing of our project. But they are some errors in page that you've created. I'll contact your administration for that. Thank you
